actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; International Trade Commission; U.S. Trade Representative; Treasury Department; State Department; Commerce Department; Agriculture Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Trade Act of 1974 in order to authorize the President to respond to foreign practices which unfairly discriminate against United States investment abroad.

summary.text: Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to authorize the President to restrict direct investment within the United States by a foreign country that unfairly discriminates against U.S. investment or by citizens, nationals, or persons who are organized or existing under the laws of such country. Changes the definition of "commerce" to include investment.
